# Changelog

All notable changes to orcheo-canvas will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [0.1.0] - 2025-11-14

### Added
- Initial public release of Canvas UI
- Workflow visualization and editing interface
- Trace viewer with agent-prism integration
- React-based component library with shadcn/ui
- Monaco editor integration for code editing
- Support for multiple chart libraries (ECharts, Recharts, Highcharts)
- Real-time workflow monitoring capabilities

### Changed
- Package name set to orcheo-canvas
- Set up automated npm publishing workflow

[Unreleased]: https://github.com/orcheo-ai/orcheo/compare/canvas-v0.1.0...HEAD
[0.1.0]: https://github.com/orcheo-ai/orcheo/releases/tag/canvas-v0.1.0
